Subject: ADB Access Issues and Samsung Smartphone Recognition Questions
Description:
I set ADB to "Deny access" in Device Control, but when I click "Use" on the smartphone connected to the PC in Device Manager, ADB becomes accessible. Is this also a simple error?

To summarize:

1. Device Control -> ADB -> Deny access
2. Device Manager -> Click "Use" on the smartphone connected to the PC -> ADB becomes accessible
3. After rebooting, it is blocked again.

Please refer to the attached file

I understand that Samsung smartphones can be detected in three different ways.
When debugging is enabled, the connected device is displayed as 'SAMSUNG Electronics Co., Ltd/SAMSUNG Android ADB Interface.' However, why is it shown as 'Galaxy series, misc. (MTP mode)' instead?
